worlds.name: Skara Brae
worlds.description:
There is an abandoned village on Orkney Islands at the north of Scotland. 
 It was abandoned long ago, when the pyramids were just started to be built.
Its name is Skara Brae. I made it for my history project. The license is Creative Commons Attribution 4.0.
Feel free to explore the village. 

Bonus: There are two more monuments to discover!
worlds.author: LEHAtupointow

worlds.name: Washing Machine
worlds.description:
A redstone alternative washing machine
It works! It's not that good but I am working on improvements. It's just a small washing machine that uses alternative redstone to function.
Rules:
At the top of the machine there is a hole with a sign and red block.
Place sand (soap) onto red block.
Quickly go to front of machine and watch water flow in the door.
I have it delayed so you have time to see it flow.
worlds.author: Temena

worlds.name: Redstone Alternatives
worlds.description: Redstone makes it possible for better interactive possibilities for creations you make. For example, you can create switches for gates to open and close them and many more things. Minecraft PE doesn't yet have the Redstone features but it shouldn't stop you from creating similar things. Even though it might not get as awesome as if you had Redstone this tutorial gives you great alternatives of what other things you can use to create similar setups.

worlds.name: Defense of the throne
worlds.description:
Hello! It's Target Practice with my first ever Multiplayer minigame map,

DEFENSE OF THE THRONE!

IMPORTANT: READ EVERYTHING BEFORE DOWNLOAD!

You are a king who wants to reclaim your kingdom. To do that, you must take the Throne. But there are other kings who want the Throne.
So you must fight for it!

Map Update!
–Now you can go up the kingdom walls
–Corrections for Throne room
–Improved kingdom walls

How to play:
You will spawn at the Castle entrance. Go and find the Throne room. If you sit on the Throne, you get 2 points.
When other players come, kill them so that they cannot take the Throne!
If you kill one player, you get 1 point.
You can play individually or play as a team. If you play as team, the points earned will be shared among the team, not individually.
If you see another player/team on the Throne, kill them and take the Throne!
Set a time limit for the game. When the game is over, the player/team with the most points wins!
If it's a draw, keep playing until someone wins!
IMPORTANT Rules:
-Don't break any blocks
-Don't place any blocks
-Play on peaceful
-Don't escape the map
-No flying
-No mods
-You can't take the Throne if there are enemies in the Throne room.

Please follow these rules if you want to enjoy a nice game.

Min players: 2
Max players: 8
worlds.author: TargetPractice

worlds.name: Game of Death
worlds.description:
Hello! It's Target Practice here. This is my second adventure map - Game of Death!
I've made a few improvements compared to the last map I made.
In this map, you will jump through the trees, fall down a spiralling Vortex and even get eaten by a dragon! It's filled with adventure, Parkour, puzzles, fighting and a slight bit of horror.

Brief Summary of the story:
You were playing your favourite video game called Game of Life. Suddenly you felt sleepy and dizzy. You fell asleep. You woke up in a familiar place. Wait. It's Corelle Town from Game of Life! What were you doing here? Soon you realise that you had to get out, and the only way to do that is to beat the game. But once you die, you die in real life! This isn't Game of Life anymore.
It's a Game of Death.
worlds.author: TargetPractice

worlds.name: Prison Escape 2
worlds.description:
This is the second part of the fun Prison Escape series. Unfortunately, the first part has been long lost.

The second part of Prison Escape is funnier because the buildings and just the overall impression of the entire map is much better. The story is quite easy.

You are stuck in a prison and want to escape.. find a way out!

Rules

Don't break any blocks (allowed to break cobweb, beds, coal, diamond, gold, iron, torches)
Must be played on hard
You are only allowed to craft armor, swords, pickaxes and torches
Set a spawn point before starting
Creator: SteffenNL
worlds.author: SteffenNL

worlds.name: Quest of the Assassin
worlds.description:
Hello, It's Target Practice! I am proud to present to you:

QUEST OF THE ASSASSIN!

A big adventure map inspired by Assassin's Creed!

READ EVERYTHING BEFORE DOWNLOAD!

THE STORYLINE:
-You woke up in a small and dark room with no memory of who you were. Suddenly a voice spoke to you. It said that you have been
kidnapped and you are in the kidnappers compound. You had to find a way out.

worlds.name: TNT Trouble
worlds.description:
One day, you wake up in a small rock room, with a chest and a bed. You have no idea how you got there. You stay in this room for many days, until a robot comes into the room.
Robot: I will let you out on one condition.
You: What is that condition?
Robot: That you undergo a number of tests. If you fail, you and your family will be killed.
You wonder what sort of a challenge it is.
Robot: The doors will open at 10:00 pm tonight.
You count the minutes until ten, wondering what on earth is in store for you.
When the hour is reached, the robot shows you into a stone room. In it, there is a ladder going down. You decend the ladder.
To your right there is a room showing which blocks you are allowed to break. To your right is the 'Challenge'...

~~~~~~~~~~~~CHANGELOG~~~~~~~~~~~
v1.1: Fix a lot of issues: Respawning on top of roof, fixed world name, added signs for story. by LEHAtupointow
v1.0: Initial release by Samuel Braithwaite
v0.1: a WIP map part found in files

worlds.author: MCPEPorts

worlds.name: Epic Sprint Parkour! [15 STAGES]
worlds.description:
Epic Sprint Map is a unique parkour map that uses the Sprint Mod to be at it's best. The entire course will take you through 15 stages that are each very fun and eye-popping. Over three weeks went into building, and at last, Epic Sprint Map is finally here!

Hello everyone! AfterShockzz here with my 6th map! This is a parkour map that was inspired by AceCraftGaming's Sprint Jump Parkour map. I want to thank him for giving me the idea :D

There is no real time record to beat, but it you feel you got a really good time, post it here :) Also, if anyone does a Youtube Let's Play, please post the link to the video here, as I would love to see you play this map.
worlds.author: AfterShockzz

worlds.name: NEXX Parkour [BEST PARKOUR MAP] [10+ STAGES]
worlds.description:
Thank you for clicking on me.This Parkour Map is Still a work In progress, my goal for this map is to fill the entire map with Parkour.Currently I have been working On this Map for 9 Months.This is a theme Parkour map filled with twists and turns.A very cool PVP arena for you and your buddy/enemy.On how I plan to update this map,I still have not verified but give it some time.You are allowed to make Play throughs.I have been working on this by myself so please people stop taking my credit.Hope you enjoy-NEXX PEACEFUL MODE ONLY! NO HOSTILE MOBS!!!

Please note that all this was almost 10 years ago.
worlds.author: ProdigyProdigousNexus
